subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Observers are wondering whether the N.F.L.’s system to handle concussions is working as designed after the Rams’ Case Keenum was allowed to continue after a head injury.
snippet: Observers are wondering whether the N.F.L.’s system to handle concussions is working as designed after the Rams’ Case Keenum was allowed to continue after a head injury.
